content:
Here's the PR that I mentioned was in progress in the last meeting: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/79001

It adds information about an assert into the PanicInfo, such that it can be formatted more nicely by e.g. the test crate's panic handler. This doesn't modify assert!() (yet), but it should also help with allowing nice formatting and colors for that macro once it gets a more advanced implementation.

Haven't reviewed it yet, but it looks promising.
